actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To continue until the close of December 31, 1994, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on photographic color couplers and certain cyclic organic chemical products used in the manufacture of photographic color couplers.

titles.title: To continue until the close of December 31, 1994, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.
